text: Hyperion is a Titan in Greek mythology. Hyperion may also mean: In science: * Hyperion (moon), a moon of Saturn * Hyperion (tree), world's tallest living tree In fiction: * Hyperion (poem), an unfinished epic poem by John Keats * Hyperion (book), a science-fiction novel by Dan Simmons, in his Hyperion Cantos series
title: Hyperion
